name: amino-ui
description: A CLI to add amino-ui components to your projects.

scripts.pub:beta: pnpm build && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public --tag beta
scripts.pub:next: pnpm build && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public --tag next
scripts.test:next: pnpm build && pnpm dlx create-next-app@latest ./test -e https://github.com/santraez/next-ts-tailwind-eslint-app-pnpm && pnpm start:dev
scripts.test:next:src: pnpm build && pnpm dlx create-next-app@latest ./test -e https://github.com/santraez/next-ts-tailwind-eslint-app-src-pnpm && pnpm start:dev

author: Anabify LLC <hello@anabify.com> (https://anabify.com/)
